ja521:5.1: tapokammaṃ → tape kammaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:7.1: tāta alakkhī ca → sirī ca tāta lakkhī ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:9.1: tvaṃ sabbesu suhadayo → so tvaṃ sabbesaṃ suhadayo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); so tvaṃ sabbe suhadayo (mr)
ja521:12.3: Uṭṭhāhato → uṭṭhahato (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | appamajjato → mappamajjato (mr)
ja521:15.1: Sakkhisi tvaṃ → sakkhī tuvaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sakkhi tuvaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja521:26.5: Sīlavāssu → sīlavassu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sīlavāssa (ṭīkā)
ja521:27.1: Apucchimha kosiyagottaṃ → apucchimhā kosiyagottaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); apucchamhāpi kosikaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:27.3: Tvaṃ dāni vadehi jambuka → jambuka tvaṃdāni vadehi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:34.1: Paññāva sutaṃ vinicchinī → paññā sutavinicchinī (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:36.4: kammaphalaṃ tassijjhati → tamphalaṃ tassa ijjhati (bj); kammaphalaṃ tassa ijjhati (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed); phalaṃ tassa samijjhati (mr)
ja521:48.2: dhammo ciṇṇo sukhāvaho → dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahati (mr)
